findfour.shared.events

Class EventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • findfour.shared.events.EventDispatcher

  • public class EventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a class on which events can be registered and raised.
    Author:
    ciske

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventDispatcher()
      Creates a new EventDispatcher instance with no registered events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void raiseEvent(int eventId)
      Raises an event with no arguments which is send to all registered handlers.
      void raiseEvent(int eventId, java.lang.Object... args)
      Raises an event with one or more arguments which is send to all registered handlers.
      void registerEvent(int eventId, java.lang.Class<?>... argTypes)
      Registers a new event in the event dispatcher.
      void registerEventHandlers(java.lang.Object instance)
      Registers all instance event handlers found in the specified class instance to this EventDispatcher instance.
      void registerStaticEventHandlers(java.lang.Class<?> type)
      Register all static event handlers found in the specified class to this EventDispatcher instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventDispatcher

        public EventDispatcher()
        Creates a new EventDispatcher instance with no registered events.

    • Method Detail

      • registerEvent

        public void registerEvent(int eventId,
                 java.lang.Class<?>... argTypes)
        Registers a new event in the event dispatcher.
        Parameters:
        eventId - The event's unique identifier which cannot already be registered.
        argTypes - The event's argument types. This cannot be null.

      • registerEventHandlers

        public void registerEventHandlers(java.lang.Object instance)
        Registers all instance event handlers found in the specified class instance to this EventDispatcher instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance of the class. This cannot be null.

      • registerStaticEventHandlers

        public void registerStaticEventHandlers(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Register all static event handlers found in the specified class to this EventDispatcher instance.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the class. This cannot be null.

      • raiseEvent

        public void raiseEvent(int eventId,
              java.lang.Object... args)
        Raises an event with one or more arguments which is send to all registered handlers.
        Parameters:
        eventId - The event identifier which must be registered.
        args - The arguments of the event. This cannot be null. The argument types must also match the argument types of the event.

      • raiseEvent

        public void raiseEvent(int eventId)
        Raises an event with no arguments which is send to all registered handlers.
        Parameters:
        eventId - The event identifier which must be registered.
